alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Southern Jasper (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 1:48PM CST until January 30 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River Near Evadale Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Neches River near Evadale. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flooding expected with the boat ramps at Evadale possibly becoming inaccessible. Flooding can be expected in the low-lying areas of the Lakeview community in Orange County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Neches River Evadale 17.0 11.2 Thu 1 pm CST 13.5 15.3 16.8 &&
